009package Ch06_CornerDetection;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import java.util.List;
015
016import ij.IJ;
017import ij.ImagePlus;
018import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
019import ij.gui.Overlay;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
023import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
024import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
025import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector.Parameters;
026import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
027import imagingbook.common.corners.MopsCornerDetector;
028import imagingbook.common.corners.ShiTomasiCornerDetector;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
031
032/**
033 * <p> 
034 * ImageJ plugin which demonstrates the use of gradient corner detectors
035 * (Harris, MOPS, Sho-Tomasi), optionally using sub-pixel positioning.
036 * See Ch. 6 of [1] for additional details.
037 * Detected corners are shown as a vector overlay on top of the 
038 * original image.
039 * </p> 
040 * <p>
041 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
042 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
043 * </p>
044 * 
045 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
046 * @see MopsCornerDetector
047 * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
048 * @see ShapeOverlayAdapter
049 * 
050 * @author WB
051 * @version 2022/03/30
052 */
053public class Find_Corners implements PlugInFilter {
054        
055        public enum DetectorType {
056                Harris, Mops, ShiThomasi;
057        }
058        
059        /** Detection algorithm to use. */
060        public static DetectorType Algorithm = DetectorType.Harris;
061        /** Number of corners to show (0 = all). */
062        public static int MaxCornerCount = 0;   
063        /** Size of the graphic corner marks. */
064        public static double CornerMarkSize = 1.0;
065        /** Stroke width used for graphic corner marks. */
066        public static double CornerMarkStrokeWidth = 0.25;
067        /** Color used for graphic corner marks. */
068        public static BasicAwtColor CornerMarkColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
069        
070        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
071        
072        private ImagePlus im;
073        
074        @Override
075    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
076        this.im = im;
077        return DOES_ALL;
078    }
079    
080        @Override
081    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
082        
083                if (!showDialog(params)) {
084                        return;
085                }
086                
087                GradientCornerDetector detector = null; 
088                switch (Algorithm) {
089                case Harris:
090                        detector = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
091                        break;
092                case Mops:
093                        detector = new MopsCornerDetector(ip, params);
094                        break;
095                case ShiThomasi:
096                        detector = new ShiTomasiCornerDetector(ip, params);
097                        break;
098                }
099                
100                List<Corner> corners = detector.getCorners();
101                
102                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
103                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
104                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
105                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(CornerMarkStrokeWidth, CornerMarkColor.getColor()));
106                
107                int cnt = 0;
108                for (Corner c : corners) {
109                        ola.addShape(c.getShape(CornerMarkSize));
110                        //IJ.log(c.toString());
111                        cnt++;
112                        if (MaxCornerCount > 0 && cnt >= MaxCornerCount) break;
113                }
114                
115                im.setOverlay(oly);
116                
117                // (new ImagePlus("Corner Score", detector.getQ())).show();     // optionally show corner score image
118    }
119    
120        private boolean showDialog(Parameters params) {
121                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
122                
123                gd.addEnumChoice("Detector type", Algorithm);
124                addToDialog(params, gd);
125                gd.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", MaxCornerCount, 0);
126                gd.addNumericField("Corners display size", CornerMarkSize, 1);
127                gd.addEnumChoice("Corner color", CornerMarkColor);
128                
129                gd.showDialog();
130                if(gd.wasCanceled())
131                        return false;
132                
133                Algorithm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(DetectorType.class);
134                getFromDialog(params, gd);
135                MaxCornerCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
136                CornerMarkSize = gd.getNextNumber();
137                CornerMarkColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
138                
139                if(gd.invalidNumber() || !params.validate()) {
140                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
141                        return false;
142                }       
143                return true;
144        }
145
146}
